headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. Named One of the Most Trustworthy Companies in America by Newsweek for Third Consecutive Year
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE: ARE), the first, preeminent, longest-tenured and pioneering owner, operator and developer of collaborative Megacampus™ ecosystems in AAA life science innovation cluster locations, today announced that it has been named one of the Most Trustworthy Companies in America by Newsweek for the third consecutive year. Alexandria was selected for this prestigious annual list, which was compiled in collaboration with the publication's market research partner St
